Description: Used 2003 Gibson Les Paul Special Double Cut in Faded Cherry finish. Two Gibson P-90 pickups, 3-way switch, 2 volumes and 2 tones. Nickel tuners. 22 fret Indian Rswd neck, 24 3/4" scale. Weighs 7 lbs 5.5 oz. Overall very good condition, with just a few minor nicks on edges, and a little bit of buckle rash on back of body. Virtually no fret wear, this guitar was never really played. Includes Gibson hard case too! Includes a free full professional setup by a real luthier, free set of strings of your choice installed. Please don't hesitate to ask any questions you may have. ** If you are the winning bidder, please message us with your string gauge and action preference ASAP.
